attributes.action: Change  The age of Mobility from 3 yrs to Birth
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I Have a terminally ill child that Gets High dla but we can not claim Mobility for another 18 Months Which i believe Needs to be amended to Help parents like me who's Child requires alot of extra Equipment for her day to day Needs , I really struggle to cope in our Car which is rather Small, Surely Mobility Should Be from Birth For cases Like ours and others in the same situation

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Change The age of Mobility from 3 yrs to Birth."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18494


Prime Minister's Office
